description:
11.37 colorhold
Remove all color information for all RGB colors except for certain one.

The filter accepts the following options:
name: colorhold

options.description: The color which will not be replaced with neutral gray.
options.name: color

options.description: Similarity percentage with the above color. 0.01 matches only the exact key color, while 1.0 matches everything.
options.name: similarity

options.description: Blend percentage. 0.0 makes pixels fully gray. Higher values result in more preserved color.
options.name: blend
